name: T - Nelson Carson
_source: speak;Nelson; Hey man, do you have a minute?
speak;Nelson; How would you like to help me escape this boat and steal these fools' gold?{w} I can see you're a fellow thief.
speak;Carson; These are my friends.{w} I'm not going to rob them blind and run away!{w} My <bconvo>wife</> is one of them!
speak;Nelson; Sorry, sorry!{w} I can see you're a bit touchy about that, clearly{tgm}...
